txt.en: 'These will do. I have another task, if you still wish to help.'
Skalla has asked you to gather fallen timber to repair the buildings in Vegbár.\n\nYou should collect fallen timber from the area surrounding Vegbár.
Skalla can be found in Vegbár, the Beorning outpost in the Wolf-denes.\n\nYou should talk to Skalla.
The Beornings of Vegbár must keep constant watch on both the High Pass and Goblin-town, and can do neither with their buildings and walls in disrepair.

'While you are out there talking to the others, would you do us a favour? We need timber for repairs to our buildings and walls. The goblins could attack at any time, and we must be ready for it. Find timber from fallen trees nearby and bring it to me.'
